ARABIC: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except for those who have iman and do right actions: they will have a wage which never fails.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except those who believe and do the right, for whom there is reward undiminished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except those who have faith and do righteous deeds. Theirs is a never ending reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except the righteously striving believers who will have a never ending reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except those who accepted faith and did good deeds – for them is a never ending reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Save those who believe and do righteous deeds. Then they shall have a reward without end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except those who believe and do good, so they shall have a reward never to be cut off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: save those who believe, and do righteous deeds; they shall have a wage unfailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save those who believe and do good works, and theirs is a reward unfailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except for those who believe and do good deeds -- theirs shall be an unending reward!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save those who believe and work righteous Works. Theirs shall be hire unending.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except those who have faith and do righteous deeds. There will be an everlasting reward for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except such as believe and do righteous deeds: For they shall have a reward unfailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Save those who believe (in Islamic Monotheism) and do righteous deeds, then they shall have a reward without end (Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except the believers who do good works, for theirs shall be an unfailing recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except those who believe and do righteous deeds; for them is a reward without end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [95:6] except those who believe and perform righteous deeds, for they shall have an unfailing reward, one unending — in a hadīth [it is stated], ‘When a believer reaches that stage of old age which prevents him from performing [good] deeds, then what he used to do is recorded in his favour [instead]’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an (and do good works) and do acts of obedience in private between themselves and their Lord, (and theirs is a reward unfailing) their reward is 763 undiminished and unspoilt, good deeds will still be written for them even in old age and after they die.
